g.text: • Low inductance • High Q-factor • RF applications
• High inductance • Low Q-factor • Power applications
• Medium inductance • Good Q-factor • RF/HF applications
• Low eddy current losses • Temperature stable
• Closed magnetic path • High efficiency • Low EMI
• Very small size • SMD mounting • High frequency
High Q-factor needed → Air core or ferrite core
High inductance needed → Iron core or toroidal
Low EMI required → Toroidal or shielded
High frequency → Air core or ferrite core
Power applications → Iron core with proper rating
